name: Messing With the Zohan
description:
MWTZ is an endless runner based on the movie "You don't mess with the Zohan". Your objective as player is to kill all the Palestinians on your way in order to score more points and achive a personal record.  You can get some of them as allies if you get them a haircut. There are bonus and many weapons to choose the best way to exterminate them.

Controls:

"w-a-s-d" to move  "space" to move  "ctrl" to shoot  

"r" to recharge  "1-2-3" to change weapon

Please fill this survey to help us:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1a0HKFxO1swSnCiNHaiaysekU7DGZgqlZwMvsvhXVMPE/edi...
